title: Season 3 and 60th Insights episode
content: After a summer break and little bit of COVID-19 delay, we will finally have the 60th(!) Quarkus Insights episode on Monday the 23rd August. For those who donâ€™t know, Quarkus Insights is a (almost) weekly video/audio podcast where we host people from all parts of the Quarkiverse to sit down...
